subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Third Baseman David Wright has been enduring a second-half slump, but in Tuesday’s loss to the Pirates, Wright tied Ed Kranepool atop the Mets career hits list with 1,418.
snippet: Third Baseman David Wright has been enduring a second-half slump, but in Tuesday’s loss to the Pirates, Wright tied Ed Kranepool atop the Mets career hits list with 1,418.
